name: cv-mf
description: CV website developed by mor bargig with microfrontend

scripts.//install: command to run all install command for each mfe app
scripts.//serve: command to serve all mfe apps, *note this will not watch for changes and work whell
scripts.//build: build all mfe components for deploy and copy mfe bundle to the host (react) public folder
scripts.build:mfe-ng-content: cd mfe-ng-content && npm run build && cd .. && copyfiles './mfe-ng-content/dist/mfe-ng-content/main*js' ./mfe-react-host/public
scripts.build:mfe-ng-header: cd mfe-ng-header && npm run build && cd .. && copyfiles './mfe-ng-header/dist/mfe-ng-header/main*js' ./mfe-react-host/public
scripts.build:mfe-ng-menu: cd mfe-ng-menu && npm run build && cd .. && copyfiles './mfe-ng-menu/dist/mfe-ng-menu/main*js' ./mfe-react-host/public
scripts.//watch: watch all mfe components for development
scripts.auth-push: git add . && git commit -m "`echo "Auto commit by $(git config user.name) at $(date +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M%z)"`"&& git push origin master

author: Mor Bargig
